participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and open-minded, Alex enjoys exploring new interests and is eager to learn about different hobbies.
participant_1.background: I live with my mother in a small town in the Midwest. I am an army ranger. I work part time in the campus library. My first big purchase was a new laptop to help me with my job search. I currently am engaged to my high school boyfriend.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and playful, Jordan loves to engage with others through his interests and has a zest for life.
participant_2.background: I'm afraid of crashing my model airplane. I would love to be a professional eater and not get fat. One of my favorite hobbies is gaming. I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables. I have one child.

content.text: What's the best purchase you have ever made?
I recently got a new gaming computer and I am really enjoying it.
That's awesome! What do you like to play?
I like to play first person shooters, but I'm also getting into some more strategy games.
I've never been big into gaming, but I've always been curious.
You should try it out! It's a great way to relax and have some fun.
Maybe I will! What's your favorite thing about gaming?
I love the sense of community and the fact that you can play with people all over the world.
That does sound like fun. Maybe I'll give it a try.
